presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line Snapshot.Opportunity Line Revenue in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line Snapshot.Open Opportunity Line Revenue in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Won Opportunity Line Revenue

presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line Snapshot.Lost Opportunity Line Revenue in Analytics Currency

tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line Snapshot.No Sale Opportunity Line Revenue in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Expired Opportunity Line Revenue
presentationColumns.description: The total Expired Opportunity Line Revenue (status = Open and Current Date greater than Expected Close date for Revenue Line)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line Snapshot.Expired Opportunity Line Revenue in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Expected Opportunity Line Revenue
presentationColumns.description: The total Expected Opportunity Line Revenue
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line Snapshot.Expected Opportunity Line Revenue in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Opportunity Line Split Revenue
presentationColumns.description: The total Opportunity Line Split Revenue
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line Snapshot.Opportunity Line Split Revenue in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Revenue Line Conversion Rate
presentationColumns.description: The Revenue Line conversion rate. This metric is computed as follows: 100 * # of Won Opportunity Revenue Lines/# of Opportunity Revenue Lines
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line Snapshot.Revenue Line Conversion Rate

presentationColumns.name: Revenue Line Won Rate
presentationColumns.description: The Revenue Line Win rate. This metric is computed as follows: 100 * # of Won Opportunity Revenue Lines/# of Won+Lost Opportunity Revenue Lines
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line Snapshot.Revenue Line Won Rate

presentationColumns.name: Revenue Line Loss Rate
presentationColumns.description: The Revenue Line Loss rate. This metric is computed as follows: 100 * # of Lost Opportunity Revenue Lines/# of Won+Lost Opportunity Revenue Lines
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line Snapshot.Revenue Line Loss Rate

presentationColumns.name: Average Won Opportunity Line Revenue
presentationColumns.description: The average Won Opportunity Line Revenue. This metric is computed as follows: Won Opportunity Line Revenue/# of Won Opportunity Revenue Lines
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line Snapshot.Average Won Opportunity Line Revenue in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Average Age of Won Opportunity Revenue Lines
presentationColumns.description: The average age of the Won Opportunity Revenue Lines. This metric is computed as follows: sum(Won Revenue Line Close Date - Won Revenue Line Created Date))/# of Won Opportunity Revenue Lines
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line Snapshot.Average Age of Won Opportunity Revenue Lines

localization.localizationKey: Average Age of Won Opportunity Revenue Lines

presentationColumns.name: Average Age of Lost Opportunity Revenue Lines
presentationColumns.description: The average age of the Lost Opportunity Revenue Lines. This metric is computed as follows: sum(Lost Revenue Line Close Date - Lost Revenue Line Created Date))/# of Lost Opportunity Revenue Lines
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line Snapshot.Average Age of Lost Opportunity Revenue Lines

localization.localizationKey: Average Age of Lost Opportunity Revenue Lines

presentationColumns.name: Average Age of No Sale Opportunity Revenue Lines
presentationColumns.description: The average age of the No Sale Opportunity Revenue Lines (sum(No Sale Revenue Line Close Date - No Sale Revenue Line Created Date))/# of No Sale Opportunity Revenue Lines
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line Snapshot.Average Age of No Sale Opportunity Revenue Lines

localization.localizationKey: Average Age of No Sale Opportunity Revenue Lines

presentationColumns.name: Average Age of Opportunity Revenue Lines
presentationColumns.description: The average age of the  Opportunity Revenue Lines. This metric is computed as follows: sum(Won/Lost/No Sale Revenue Line Close Date - Won/Lost/No Sale Revenue Line Created Date))/# of Won+Lost+No Sale Opportunity Revenue Lines
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line Snapshot.Average Age of Opportunity Revenue Lines

localization.localizationKey: Average Age of Opportunity Revenue Lines

presentationColumns.name: Average # of Days Open
presentationColumns.description: The average number of days an Opportunity Revenue Line is Open. This metric is computed as follows: (Current Date - Open Opportunity Revenue Line Creation Date)/# of Open Opportunity Revenue Lines)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line Snapshot.Average # of Days Open

presentationColumns.name: # of Raw Opportunity Revenue Lines
presentationColumns.description: The total Raw Opportunity Revenue Lines
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line Snapshot.# of Raw Opportunity Revenue Lines

presentationColumns.name: Raw Opportunity Line Revenue
presentationColumns.description: The total Raw Opportunity Line Revenue
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line Snapshot.Raw Opportunity Line Revenue in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Weighted Open Opportunity Line Revenue
presentationColumns.description: The total Weighted Opportunity Line Revenue. This metric is computed as follows: Open Opportunity Revenue * Win Probability
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line Snapshot.Weighted Open Opportunity Line Revenue in Analytics Currency
